pages.text: The $(item)Reprocessor$() uses Zaps to make Scrap out of any other item.$(br2)Scrap and Scrap Boxes can be used in the $(l:ftbic:machines/antimatter_constructor)Antimatter Constructor$() to make Antimatter cheaper.
It costs 600âš¡ to recycle an item into Scrap.$(br2)Without $(l:ftbic:items/upgrades)upgrades$(), it accepts only up to MV current.
